main event: An unknown number of silver colored objects, flying in an unknown formation, were observed in Laramie, Wyoming on June 11, 1956.
interesting points: The object was reported to be about 8 miles in diameter and appeared at approximately 7000 feet AGL,The object changed course and accelerated at a high rate of speed moving south to southwest,It disappeared from view in 10 seconds,No exhaust or sound was detected,The motion of the object was described as erratic and zigzag.
witness description: reportedly attempted to reconstruct the incident
